mapper.select: select * from review, product where review.prd_no = product.prd_no and product.pg_no = #{pg_no}
select UNIQUE prd_name from review, product where review.prd_no = product.prd_no and review.prd_no = #{prd_no}
select * from review where rev_content like '#{keyword}'
select * from review, product where review.prd_no = product.prd_no and product.pg_no = #{pg_no} order by review.rev_star_rate DESC
select * from (select review.* from review, product where review.prd_no = product.prd_no and product.pg_no = #{pg_no}) where rev_star_rate = #{rate}
SELECT count(*) FROM review, product WHERE review.prd_no = product.prd_no and product.pg_no = ${pg_no}
